TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CounterSet extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

span.span: Defines a set of logical counters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 完成删除提供程序的注册并释放所有托管资源和非托管资源时，请调用方法。Call the method when you are finished to remove your provider's registration and to release all managed and unmanaged resources. ## Examples 有关示例，请参见 。For an example, see .

span.span: Identifies the type of the counter set, for example, whether the counter set is a single or multiple instance counter set.

span.span: Not supported prior to Windows Vista.

span.span: One of the parameters is NULL or not valid.

exception.span: 基础 Win32 函数调用失败。

span.span: An underlying Win32 function call failed.

summary.span: 向计数器集中添加计数器。

span.span: Adds a counter to the counter set.

Public Sub AddCounter (counterId As Integer, counterType As CounterType)

param.name: counterId

span.span: Identifies the counter.

param.span: 使用在清单中所用的值来定义计数器。

span.span: Use the same value that you used in the manifest to define the counter.

param.name: counterType

span.span: Identifies the counter type.

param.span: 计数器类型用来确定如何计算和显示计数器数据以及如何对其求平均值。

span.span: The counter type determines how the counter data is calculated, averaged, and displayed.

summary.span: 使用指定的计数器标识符和类型向计数器集中添加计数器。

span.span: Adds a counter to the counter set by using the specified counter identifier and type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在为计数器集创建实例之前，必须先向其中添加计数器。You must add counters to the counter set before creating an instance of the counter set.

exception.span: 计数器标识符已经存在于计数器集中、计数器标识符为负数，或者计数器类型为 NULL 或无效。

span.span: The counter identifier already exists in the set or is negative, or the counter type is NULL or not valid.

exception.span: 在为计数器集创建实例之后，将无法向其中添加计数器。

span.span: You cannot add counters to the counter set after creating an instance of the counter set.

(See .)

summary.span: 使用指定的计数器标识符和类型以及计数器的显示名称向计数器集中添加计数器。

span.span: Adds a counter to the counter set by using the specified counter identifier and type and a display name for the counter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在为计数器集创建实例之前，必须先向其中添加计数器。You must add counters to the counter set before creating an instance of the counter set. ## Examples 有关示例，请参见 。For an example, see .

exception.span: 计数器标识符已经存在于计数器集中、计数器标识符为负数，或者计数器类型为 NULL 或无效。

span.span: The counter identifier already exists in the set or is negative, or the counter type is NULL or not valid.

exception.span: 在为计数器集创建实例之后，将无法向其中添加计数器。

span.span: You cannot add counters to the counter set after creating an instance of the counter set.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSetInstance CreateCounterSetInstance (string instanceName);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSetInstance CreateCounterSetInstance(string instanceName) cil managed
Public Function CreateCounterSetInstance (instanceName As String) As CounterSetInstance
public: System::Diagnostics::PerformanceData::CounterSetInstance ^ CreateCounterSetInstance(System::String ^ instanceName);
member this.CreateCounterSetInstance : string -> System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSetInstance

span.span: Name of the instance.
The name must be unique.

summary.span: 创建计数器集的一个实例。

span.span: Creates an instance of the counter set.

returns.span: 将包含计数器数据的计数器集的实例。

span.span: An instance of the counter set which will contain the counter data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为单实例计数器集调用此方法一次，对多实例计数器集调用一次或多次。Call this method one time for single-instance counter sets and one or more times for multiple-instance counter sets. 提供程序确定何时创建实例。The provider determines when it creates an instance. 如果计数器数据更静态，则提供程序可以在初始化时创建实例。If the counter data is more static, the provider can create an instance at initialization time. 例如，计算机上的处理器数将被视为是静态的，因此提供处理器计数器数据的提供程序可以在初始化时为计算机上的每个处理器创建一个实例。For example, the number of processors on a computer would be considered static, so a provider that provides counter data for processors could create an instance for each processor on the computer at initialization time. 对于更动态的计数器（例如磁盘或进程计数器），提供程序将创建新的实例，以响应要添加的新 USB 设备或正在创建的新进程。For counters that are more dynamic, such as disk or process counters, the providers would create the new instances in response to a new USB device being added or a new process being created. 提供程序始终将计数器数据保持最新状态。The provider should keep the counter data up-to-date at all times. ## Examples 有关示例，请参见 。For an example, see .

span.span: The instance name is NULL.

exception.span: 在为计数器集创建实例之前，必须先向其中添加计数器。

span.span: You must add counters to the counter set before creating an instance of the counter set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由运行时自动调用。This method is called automatically by the runtime.
